mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_BOARD (MOVIE_ID, M_TITLE, M_CONTENT, M_WRITER, post_img, post_thumbimg, category_id) VALUES (M_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{m_title}, #{m_content}, #{m_writer}, #{post_img}, #{post_thumbimg}, #{category_id})
mapper.select:
SELECT MOVIE_ID, M_TITLE, M_WRITER, M_DATE, M_HIT, post_img, post_thumbimg, category_id FROM ( SELECT MOVIE_ID, M_TITLE, M_WRITER, M_DATE, M_HIT, post_img, post_thumbimg, category_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MOVIE_ID DESC) AS RNUM FROM MOVIE_BOARD WHERE 1=1
) RE WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY MOVIE_ID DESC

SELECT COUNT(MOVIE_ID) FROM MOVIE_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND MOVIE_ID > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE MOVIE_BOARD SET M_TITLE = #{m_title}, M_CONTENT = #{m_content}, post_img = #{post_img}, post_thumbimg = #{post_thumbimg}, category_id = #{category_id} WHERE MOVIE_ID = #{movie_id}
UPDATE MOVIE_BOARD SET M_HIT = M_HIT+1 WHERE MOVIE_ID = #{movie_id}
